responses: CES (Center for Engineering Solutions) outreach includes initiatives like CES and CEAC to connect with students and professionals for skill development.

patterns: What are the executive programs under CEAC?
Tell me about the CEAC executive programs
What programs are offered under CEAC?
responses: The CEAC Executive programs include M. Tech. in AIML, Post Graduate Diploma in Cyber Security, and MTech in VLSI Design (Executive).

patterns: What activities are part of Unnat Bharat Abhiyan?
Tell me about Unnat Bharat Abhiyan activities
responses: Unnat Bharat Abhiyan includes activities like SHG-1, SHG-2, and SHG-3 to promote rural development and community engagement.

patterns: How can I contact the Continuing Education Program?
What is the email address for Continuing Education?
Give me the contact details for Continuing Education
responses: You can contact the Continuing Education Program via email at dean.contedu@iitjammu.ac.in.

patterns: Where can I know more about the Continuing Education Program?
How can I learn more about the Continuing Education Program?
Give me more information about the Continuing Education Program
responses: Visit the website at [https://www.iitjammu.ac.in/cep/](https://www.iitjammu.ac.in/cep/) for more details about the Continuing Education Program.
